<?xml version1.0 ?> <project namewebtestClasspath> <description> DEPRECATED since November 2007: use webtest.xml instead of this file!
This project provides following elements to use in your test scripts:
(0) the path "webtest.path.id" that includes all of webtest's libraries,
Usage: Set the property webtest.home to the directory in which the build.zip is extracted, and calls: <import file${webtest.home}/lib/classpath.xml > </description>
<echo messageDEPRECATED since November 2007: use webtest.xml instead of lib/classpath.xml! levelwarning/>
<dirname propertywebtest.classpath.dir file${ant.file.webtestClasspath} /> <path idwebtest.path.id> <-- to find webtest's log4j properties --> <pathelement location${webtest.classpath.dir}//> <fileset dir${webtest.classpath.dir} includes*.jar/> <fileset dir${webtest.classpath.dir} includesoptional/*.jar/> <fileset dir${webtest.classpath.dir} includesplugins/**/*.jar/> <fileset dir${webtest.classpath.dir} includesruntime/*.jar/> </path> </project>
